content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #501:

Lightbeam was removed in https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3390 as explained in RFC 14, so I'm going to close this.

alexcrichton closed issue #501:

Now that cranelift can emit unwind, a similar implementation should be made to lightbeam to allow the registration of unwind information for JIT functions.

See https://github.com/CraneStation/cranelift/pull/1155 for the cranelift implementation.
